name: Power Washer Hero
description: After receiving a mysterious power washer you have an irresistible urge to spray and douse your way through an exaggerated physics based world. Feel the pressure of your power washer as you control its strength. Powerups lets you reach new heights and speeds once thought unobtainable. Objects, fires, and grime wither in front of your might. Will you be the hero this town deserves?
